name: Instagram Insights to Microsoft Power BI Integration
description:
Transform your Instagram metrics into meaningful insights with Microsoft Power BI. Ideal for marketers, this integration schedules data transfers weekly and allows for schedule adjustments to suit your reporting needs, helping you craft compelling content driven by detailed analytics.

Please note, your Microsoft Power BI table must have the following columns in this order:

- Media ID
- Impressions
- Reach
- Saved
- Video views
- Replies
- Media URL
